text: ' Melrose Place'was the height of water - cooler TV in the'90s with its bonkers plot twists, bed - hopping and backstabbing. And audiences couldn ’ t get enough. If Twitter had been around in the'90s, TV sensation Melrose Place would have crashed it. It really was that big, up there with Seinfeld, Dawson ’ s Creek, Friends, Buffy the Vampire Slayer, The X - Files and ER.
